thread.section_title: Phoenix Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good quality/price ratio
thread.title_full: Very good quality/price ratio - Review of Phoenix Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Djandair
title: Very good quality/price ratio
text:
I chose to stay at this B&B for a couple of nights when having to spend a long weekend in London for a conference. The price was considerably cheap and it included a continental breakfast. The (single) room itself was, as expected, considerably self-contained but everything was very well arranged, clean and comfortable. There was also an en-suite bathroom with everything working very well. The maids changed and replenished all the used soap, shampoo, towels and coffee each morning.
The breakfast room was very large and there always was room for people arriving, with good service and a considerable array of cereal, juice, fruit, cheese and toast available.
Geographically, it's about a 5 minute walk from both Hyde Park (Kensington Palace end) and Paddington Railway Station. There are lots of services in the area, many bus routes and a few tube stations within a stone's throw.
